mapper.select: SELECT ID, MEMBER_ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_GENDER,MEMBER_BIRTHDAY, MEMBER_RF_CARD FROM TBL_MEMBER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER(ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_BIRTHDAY, MEMBER_ZIPCODE, MEMBER_ADDRESS, MEMBER_ADDRESS_DETAIL , MEMBER_ENROLL_TYPE, MEMBER_GOAL , MEMBER_INTEREST, MEMBER_WORKOUT_HOUR , MEMBER_SMS_AGREEMENT ,MEMBER_TM_AGREEMENT, MEMBER_SELF_AGREEMENT, MEMBER_MEMO, MEMBER_VISIT_PATH) VALUES(SEQ_MEMBER.NEXTVAL, #{memberName}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberGender}, #{memberBirthday}, #{memberZipcode}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberAddressDetail}, #{memberEnrollType}, #{memberGoal}, #{memberInterest}, #{memberWorkoutHour}, #{memberSmsAgreement},#{memberTmAgreement} ,#{memberSelfAgreement}, #{memberMemo}, #{memberVisitPath})
